text: læa brrda phu sraththa brrda luk hlan khxng phwk khea ca danein tamph wk khea dwy kar sraththa rea ca hı luk hlan khxng phwk khea xyu rwm kab phwk khea læa rea ca mi hıkar ngan khxng phwk khea ldhyxn lng cak phwk khea tæ xyang dı tæla khn yxm di rab kar khaprakan nı sing thi khea khwnkhway wi
